choices: in a shop (with a price on her chest).
in a house she didn't know.
in the middle of the forest.
in front of the door of a castle.
1.content:
Alhandra is a female knight who always fights for good. One day, while searching after the evil sorceress Ielenia, she founded her castle. After succesfully passing all the traps, she reached the last room: Ielenia's room. After an even battle, Alhandra cornered Ielenia. But just as Alhandra prepared to perform the last blow with her sword, Ielenia spoke a spell:
"For trying to kill me in my own house,
you will now shrink to the size of a mouse".
Just as the last word was spoken, Alhandra started to glow in a light blue light. "What's happening?", said Alhandra, as Ielenia started to grow before her eyes. After some seconds, the glow faded and Ielenia stopped growing. Alhandra looked at everything else: "All the room was huge". She realized that Ielenia hadn't grown, she shrunk! She was now 2 inches tall.
She stared up and saw that the giant sorceress was benting down. Ielenia's hand was now approaching to Alhandra. She took her sword and with a fast movement, she made a cut on Ielenia's palm.
"Ouch!", said Ielenia, standing up and holding her hand with the other. Alhandra ran towards the door, but just before she reached it, a giant sandal stomped in front of her. The tremor made her fall on her ass.
"You are going nowhere", said Ielenia. Alhandra raised her sword once more, but Ielenia, with a swift movement of her foot, kicked it off her hand.
"What are you going to do now without your sword?", asked Ielenia as she slowly raised her foot over Alhandra.
Suddenly, a strong earthquake made them both fall down. Then, the roof of the castle was teared of, and a huge red dragon's head appeared from above. It breathed a long line of fire, but the sorceress made a magic shield to protecct her. Alhandra wasn't reached by the fire, but the intense heat made her faint.

When she woke up, she was...
1.title: A shrinking heroine

11.content: When she woke up, she was standing on a soft surface. She looked down and saw that she was standing on a huge palm. She turned around and saw an enormous face looking at her. The face belonged to...
11.title: Home, sweet home.

choices: "I'd love to play, but this is important".
114.content:
"Mommy!", said the girl, "you are awake".
"What happened", said Alhandra, "how did I come here?".
"I found you when I was walking through the village. First, I thought you were a doll, but then I recognized you".
"Where is my sword?", said Alhandra.
"It's right here", said the girl, as she put the sword on her palm, next to her mother.
"Oh, thank God!", said Alhandra, "I need you to help me to find the woman that shrunk me, OK?".
"Let's play first, since you are that size we could have so much fun", said the girl.
114.title: Little mommy

1141.content:
Now that alhandra was played with her daughter she was tired out. So she took a nap. She was not with her daughter instead she was a dark room in a jar.the door opened and then closed.she was worried about who it was.

The person now came in to the room she saw she still in her house because she saw her daughter in there. when she was about to call her she was picked by her foot. she was wearing normal clothing.she could not make out who it was.

she was now lifted upside down backward.the face was on the other side of her.they were not trying to hurt her. but they really did not know her to well but they had to have met.
1141.title: not the same

choices: The snake slithers right past her.
1142.content:
"Aww you're no fun." the girl said as Alhandra picked up her blade. Carefully grasping her mother in her hand the girl left the house walked to town. Obeying her mother's words she started to travel around town asking around about Ielenia the evil sorceress. After about an hour of searching the girl rested on the ground near a tree.

"Mommy I'm hungry." the girl asked her mother as she placed her on the ground next to her.

"Well since you have some money you can get us something to eat." Alhandra said to her daughter.

"Okay I'll be right back." the girl said leaving Alhandra there on the ground as she ran off into town.

"Wait don't leave me here." Alhandra but it was to late her daughter failed to hear her voice. Just as this was happening a small gardener snake slithered in her direction. Drawing her sword she prepared to defend herself.
1142.title: No time for playing

11421.content: She looked at the snake she had always been scared of snakes she backed away and prepared for it to come towards her but it just slitherd past her. She scaverd her sword and sat down on a small stone what happens to her/
11421.title: The snake slithers right past her.

12.content:
When she woke up, she was on a huge table. There were bottles, strange amulets, and some small weapons. She then noticed a piece of paper on her chest, there was something written on it: "50 gold coins".
"What?", she said.
"Oh, you are awake", said a voice behind her.
She turned around and saw a colossal man standing behind the table.
"Why am I here?", she said.
"I'm selling you", said the man.
"You can't sell me, I'm not a thing!", she said.
The man took out a crystal glass and put it face down over Alhandra.
"Now you can't escape", he said.
She then closed her eyes and started to think. Just then, she heard a voice talking: "I want the wing-less fairy". She opened her eyes. In front of her there was...
12.title: "For sale"

choices: He arrives to his house without problems.
123.content:
"OK", said the man, "do you have the 50 gold coins?".
"Sure", said the boy, giving them to the man.
The man then removed the glass and picked up Alhandra. She struggled but it was useless. The man handled her to the boy, who grabbed her tightly and run out of the store. He then seated on a bench in the street and put her on his right knee. She coughed a little and then looked up to the boy.
"Hi, little fairy", said the boy.
"Hi", said Alhandra.
"How did you lose your wings?", he said.
"An evil woman took them from me, have you seen one?" asked her.
"No", he said, "but I can help you find her".
"Really?", she said.
"Yes", he answered, "but first we have to go to my house, maybe my parents can help us".
He began running to his house.
123.title: Big help

124.content:
"Oh, sure" said the seller, as he handed Alhandra to the knight. The knight payed and took her out of the shop.
"Sorry, but I had to buy you, I need your help", said the knight.
"How?", said Alhandra.
"My magic ring has been stolen, and the thief has it in his house. But I can't get it, if I enter to a house without permission, my position as a knight would be stained".
"OK, I'll help you", she said, "so, how did you say the thief's name was?".
124.title: A mission

choices: The feather with which Cora was writing falls near Alhandra.
Cora stands up and goes to one door.
1242.content:
"Her name is Cora, she lives in that house, maybe you can get in without being noticed".
He took her in front of the house, then released her.
"Good luck", he said.
Alhandra crawled under the door. The room where she now was had a table, a chair, two doors and a bookseller. A woman was sitting on the chair, writing something. The woman was a human, her long brown hair was tied up in a ponytail. Her eyes where brown too. She was all dressed black, with black boots.
Alhandra approached to her feet. Then she looked at Cora's fingers. None of them had the ring on.
"It must be somewhere around here", she thought.
Just then ...
1242.title: Cora's house

12421.content:
The feather with which Cora was writing fall near Alhandra. Cora's gloved hand approached to the floor. Quickly, Alhandra grabbed a nail that was on the floor and hid behind a leg of the table. As soon as the hand reached the floor, Alhandra run towards it and stabbed it with the nail. Cora shouted in pain, standing up. She then looked under the table.
"So it was you, you little bug!", said Cora as she raised her foot over Alhandra. The foot stomped on the floor, as Alhandra managed to dodge it. Cora stomped her foot again and again, but Alhandra was too fast.
"I'm not afraid of you", said Alhandra, "even if you are a giant compared to me!".
"Well, let's see", said Cora, as the bent on her knees. She then slammed her fist towards Alhandra, but she, once again, dodged it.
"Now I have a surprise for you", said Cora, as she took a ring out of her pocket and put it on her finger. Then, from the palm of her hand, a ray of energy arised and flew directly to Alhandra. She barely evaded it, but a second ray attacked her. This time, she used the nail to reflect the ray to Cora's legs, so she fell down.
Alhandra then approached to Cora's hand and took the ring out of her finger. She then run towards the door, crawled under it, and got out of the house.
The knight was waiting outside, and he picked up Alhandra as she got there. Cora then opened the door, but as soon as she saw the night, she closed it.
"Well done", said the kight, "now you will have your reward. You will have...
12421.title: The showdown

124212.content:
"by completed this dangerous task you show me that you really are worthy once again"say the knight

"what you mean by that,have we met somewhere before"Alhandra asks

"well not personnaly but i hear so much about you,Alhandra that you face dangerous that others don´t have courage,completed task that many say that impossible and by seen you in action i underdent why"

so the knight knelt to Alhandra and gives her a sword of her size,that have a red blade,soon as Alhandra tocht it she realize that sword was not a regular one not just because of the color of the blade(but hte way she saw many swords that are made just for decoration and that not last one hit)
but who will made a sword like this for a person in this size.

"this blade is not a ordinary one"Alhandra says

"i don´t that you will be able to much help with a normal one,let tell you this sword was used by the valkyrie-fairies them used to be the most powerful race on this word"-knight

"what i don´t belive this and them were this size like the fairies that we seen today"

"yes even with its miniscule size they managed to defeat the men of normal size and even dragons,but the nowadays
fairies don´t have the same power and i belive that you are reincarnation of one of them and now that this big, this awakening his power and even better try and see this sword you yourself"--the knight asks
124212.title: a magic sword"(tiny, of course)".

choices: Something happens on route to wherever
125.content:
Alhandra looked up and saw a tall man decked out in what looked like a pure black mage robe with a long hood obscuring his face.


"50 gold." The man in robes pulled out a small pouch, reached in, and handed the shopkeeper exactly 50 gold coins.


"She's all yours." Then the shopkeeper handed Alhandra, who was now shaking in her tiny boots, over to the stranger. The stranger then held her in a tight grasp so she wouldn't escape and walked out of the shop.
125.title: Mr. tall, dark, and unknown

13.content:
When she woke up, she noticed she was on a huge bed. She stood up and watched the room. It was a small room. In addition to the bed, there were two windows, a bureau, and a wooden door.
She then heard footsteps approaching and the door opened. A giant figure entered to the room. The figure was...
13.title: Who's house?

14.content: When she woke up, she saw huge trees, long grass, enormous bushes and giant rocks. She climbed to one of the rocks to have a better view. Just then, she heard a sound coming from a bush. Suddenly, right in front of her appeared a...
14.title: Forest creatures

142.content:
She now stared at the huge creature in front of you. It is a beautiful, blonde barefoot woman. She had blue eyes, and was only wearing a white gown.
Alhandra thought she could help her, so she started yelling and weaving her arms. The giant woman looked down at her, approached and kneeled in front of her.
142.title: The nymph

1422.content:
Suddenly, they heard a roar far away.
"Dragons!", said the nymph, as she quickly grabed Alhandra with her enormous hand and run through the forest.
She run until she reached a crystalline fountain.
"Sorry for that", said the nymph, as she relieased Alhandra on the surface of the fountain's water. Alhandra started swimming, looking at the two colossal legs at each of her sides.
1422.title: The fountain

1451.content:
She realized that not only the bush was shaking, but also the trees and the ground. Suddenly, in front of her eyes she saw an enormous man, much bigger than Ielenia. He was wearing a robe made of jaguar skin. He had black hair and brown eyes.
He was holding an enormous wooden mace in his right hand.
1451.title: Even bigger

14511.content:
He looked down at her, surprised. He then went to his hands and knees to get a better view. Alhandra watched nervously the gigantic face in front of her. He then grabbed the rock with his hand. Then shaked it, so Alhandra fall over his other hand (which was the size of a pool to her).
"You are too small to be eaten, not even ten of you could satisfy me", he said.
He then started walking to his cave. There was a bonfire in the middle of it. There, he dropped her on a coconut shell and fall asleep.
14511.title: In the giant's cave

choices: Try to talk to him, he could help you.
14512.content: She recognized the creature immediately, it was a giant. He was so big even to notice her, so he continued walking. He lifted his foot over Alhandra. She jumped off the rock and landed right next to it. The enormous bare foot of the giant landed just and inch far from Alhandra, crushing the rock. The giant then sat down with his legs outstretched. Alhandra started to think on what to do.
14512.title: Reliable?

145121.content: She slowly approached to the massive leg of the giant. There, the started to jump, wave her arms and yell:"Hello, down here!".
145121.title: Getting his attention

1452.content: Maybe a big, winged, fire-breathing reptile?
1452.title: A dragon?

15.content: When she woke up, she noticed that she was in front of a huge castle. The door was right before her eyes and two guards (who hadn't seen her) were guarding it. The two guards were...
15.title: The castle door.

info.brief_description: Alhandra is a female knight who is shrunk. Will she survive in a giant fantasy world?
info.description:
Alhandra is a female knight who is shrunk by an evil sorceress. She now has to fight against terrible dangers to get back to normal.

-No killing Alhandra, unless it's a good ending.
-No sex.
-No adult language.
-No gay stuff.
-No toilet stuff.
-Keep Alhandra fighting for her life.
-Keep gore to a minimum.
-Try to create new characters.
-There can be male or female giants.
-Remember it's Middle-age, so keep the technology according to that time.
-Remember it's a fantasy story, so create any type of mythical creature, from a fairy to a dragon.

Have fun and add!
